David Vaughan Icke (; born 29 April 1952) is an English professional conspiracy theorist and former footballer and sports broadcaster.
He is the author of over 20 books and many DVDs and has lectured in over 25 countries, speaking for up to 10 hours to audiences. He is known for his conspiracy theory that many of the world's most important figures are lizard people.
In the 1990s, he was a sports commentator for BBC. A footballer, he played for Coventry City and Hereford United.
